# Ride Ready

> Ride Ready is an iOS app that provides real-time theme park wait times, personalized ride recommendations, and queue alerts for Epic Universe, Universal Orlando, Cedar Point, and other major parks.

## About This Site

This is the marketing website for Ride Ready. It includes:
- App features and download links
- Epic Universe strategy guides with data-driven insights
- Queue time trackers showing room-by-room wait times for popular rides

## Key Pages

- Homepage: https://rideready.app/
- Epic Universe Holiday Strategy Guide: https://rideready.app/epic-universe/2025-holiday-strategy/
- Epic Universe Overview: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/

## Queue Time Guides

Interactive guides showing how long you'll wait based on your current position in line:

- Battle at the Ministry: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/ministry-queue-times/
- Mario Kart: Bowser's Challenge: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/mario-kart-queue-times/
- Stardust Racers: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/stardust-racers-queue-times/
- Mine-Cart Madness: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/mine-cart-madness-queue-times/
- Monsters Unchained: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/monsters-unchained-queue-times/
- Hiccup's Wing Gliders: https://rideready.app/universal-orlando/epic-universe/hiccups-wing-gliders-queue-times/

## Supported Parks

- Epic Universe (Universal Orlando)
- Universal Studios Florida
- Islands of Adventure
- SeaWorld Orlando
- Busch Gardens Tampa
- Cedar Point
- Kings Island
- Canada's Wonderland

## App Download

iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ride-ready/id6748330847

## Contact

support@rideready.app
